contents.text: Thank you for calling Zignal Labs in San Francisco, the only media analytics platform harnessing the entire digital media landscape in real time.
For Sales and Product Information, press 1.
For a live platform demo showcasing our real-time media analytics, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for a live demo.

navigationGoals: Request a live demonstration of Zignal Labs’ real-time media analytics platform
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your real-time media analytics to see how it could help my veteran outreach program.
I need a live walkthrough of your real-time media analytics dashboard.
I’d like someone to give me a live walkthrough of the platform demo.
I’d like to schedule a live walkthrough of Zignal’s real-time analytics for my media-trend research.

contents.text: For details about pricing and subscription plans, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing and billing team.

navigationGoals: Inquire about pricing options and subscription plans
I need details on your subscription plans and pricing, including any discounts for veterans.
Provide pricing details and API call limits for the enterprise subscription.
I need help understanding your pricing and subscription plans.
Could you provide details on subscription plans and any academic pricing for student researchers?

contents.text: For Technical Support and Customer Service, press 2.
If you need technical assistance or troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: Get technical assistance to troubleshoot an issue with the analytics platform
I’m having trouble accessing the analytics dashboard and need technical assistance to troubleshoot my login.
I need help troubleshooting my API data ingestion errors.
I’m having technical issues and need troubleshooting assistance.
I’m encountering errors when uploading my dataset to the analytics dashboard and need troubleshooting help.

contents.text: For onboarding, training, and help resources, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our customer success team.

navigationGoals: Access onboarding, training, and help resources for the platform
As a new user, I’d like onboarding resources and training on how to navigate and use the platform effectively.
I’d like to schedule onboarding training for configuring custom dashboards.
I want onboarding and training support to learn how to use the platform.
I need onboarding guidance and training resources to get started with the API and reporting tools.
